title: Master of Wolves
description: Jim London is outraged over the death of his friend, a fellow cop and werewolf--and wants to get to the bottom of what he thinks was murder. The only way to find out is to go undercover--and, in his wolf form, Jim can do that better than anybody. There's one complication: the new K9 handler, Faith Weston, is sexy enough to bring out the animal in any man.
author: Angela Knight
